EmailTemplate.description: PRO Template for $0 PO &/or Missing Data
EmailTemplate.name: PRO Order Request-HON liability-Missing key information
EmailTemplate.subject: Production Return â€“ Additional Information Needed {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
We have not received your updated purchase order to start working on your production return unit (Part number: {!Case.Product_Part__c}, Serial number:{!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}) for your PO No.{!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}.
Any PRO unit returned for rework should include a zero dollar PO with: Honeywell entity address, rework PO number, Honeywell P/N and S/N, Quantity, Bill to, Customer delivery address and Carrier and Freight details.
Unless we receive the required information within the next 5 days, the return as is process will be initiated.
An invoice for evaluation and any non-recoverable time and materials required to troubleshoot your rework will be included if applicable.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
